message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product at a price of $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,200 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $8,850?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target price.
